page.title: 07EDUCATION 5-14 (part 1)
page.content: In Broughton Astley,children start school at the age of{5}either at Old Mill or at Orchard Primary School.At {11}they transfer to high school.Thomas Estley Community College opened in{ {1976.}Now{507}children attend.Mr. Gelsthorpe thinks this number is fine, because it's just right for all the activities available.There are around {40}teachers at the college. Registration is at{9.05}and afternoon school ends at{3.20p.m. }Mr.Gelsthorpe thinks they have an advantage over other colleges because of their good staff.Another advantage is that they have a new,modern building.To keep the school running they need around{ {Â£20,000.}This doesn't include the money that goes to pay the staff's wages.The college is used by other clubs and groups.Every year they raise money for funds such as Ethiopia.
